name: Sleepy Eyes - Molnar Recreation V.1
description: Inspired by Vera Molnar, this piece captures the soft, dark blur of eyelids drifting shut. Starting from Garrit's code, I experimented with values and replaced sharp lines with smooth curves.

name: All Eyes On Me - Molnar Recreation V.2
description: Inspired by Vera Molnar, this piece captures the sensation of countless eyes watching, with randomized colors swirling like a crowd of gazes fixed on me. I built upon Garrit's code again, implementing a function for the colour randomisation.

name: Hearbeat - Recreation of Noise Landscape - V.1
description: A red, moving noise-landscape built on Garrit's code, where racing lines pulse like the heart's always-high tempo.

name: Rising Hearbeat - Recreation of Noise Landscape V.1.1
description: A rougher, more chaotic version of Heartbeat, where jagged lines represent the anxious feeling of the body

name: Dunes - Recreation of Noise Landscape V.2
description: Slow, flowing lines and fading sandy tones recreate the gentle, shifting motion of desert dunes, built from Garrit's original code. Here I made the speed of the line much slower, and their size smaller.

name: Interesections - Particle Explosion V.1
description: An experiment using the particle code as a starting point where I created hollow circles with randomized stroke weights each time the mouse clicks. I played around with the values, and thanks to setting higher velocity there is a feeling of moving when the circles are created.

name: Aura - Particle Explosion V.2
description: A variation of Particle Explosion where smaller circles appear with two colors upon mouse click. When the circles intersect, their overlapping area turns white, creating a glowing effect.

name: Aura Windows - Particle Explosion V.3
description: A variation of Particle Explosion where rectangles with no fill, only strokes, are created with each mouse click. The rectangles form a window-like effect, with the intersection area glowing white when they overlap.

name: Icicles Sound
description: A variation of Particle Explosion where line-like shards burst out with each mouse click, creating a dynamic visual effect. Each explosion is paired with a random musical note, combining custom particle code with techniques from the Tone.js documentation.
